reviewText: This is a wonderful documentary type dvd that takes you on a tour of a number of lighthouses.  It's a great video to watch with the entire family.  Anyone who loves lighthouses and collects books, photos and lighthouse memorabilia should have this in hhis or her collection.
A broad spectrum of lighthouses and their locations.....enjoyable watching for a rainy afternoon! Any lighthouse collector or officianato should have this in his or her collection.
